description:
Despite their injuries from their recent battles, Seiya and his fellow competitors pursue Ikki and the Gold Cloth he has stolen to advance his plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En Busca de la Armadura de Oro
La défaite de l`armée des ombres
À procura da armadura de ouro
倒せ! 暗黒フェニックス軍団
